title: What is the relationship between physical sensitivity and spiritual development according to this text?
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author explained how our focus on the material world and bodily sensations can lead to a lack of awareness and attention to our inner world. This results in a spiritual deafness that prevents us from conceiving the possibility of a spiritual reality. In the final 200 tokens, the author introduces the concept of the "will to conserve individual consciousness" as a force that can help us overcome this spiritual deafness. The author emphasizes that this intelligent will is not the same as the brute instinct to preserve our physical bodies. Rather, it requires a conscious effort to break free from habitual ways of experiencing life and to become aware of our spiritual reality.
